textRegions.text: Get more people watching your video.
Neon selects thumbnails that people want to click.
Publishers need to increase the likelihood that users will click to watch their videos.
Little attention has been paid to the first touchpoint between the publisher and the viewer.
In June 2012, internet users clicked on 33 billion video thumbnails.
Neon extracts the best thumbnails for the audience publishers want to reach.
Product Description: software service that programatically selects the best thumbnail
Our science-based approach to thumbnail selection results in better click through rates.
Why it works: Our software models how the brain perceives image preference

Moshe Bar, Ph.D
Scientific Advisor, Harvard
